name: Frontend Developer (Mercedes-Benz Financial Services)
description:
Daimler Financial Services (DFS) provides customers with a range of mobility options from financing and leasing to insurance and fleet management. The Digital Solution Centre (DSC) located in Singapore plays a pivotal role for DFS’s business development by driving digital adoption and innovation.

As a Front End Developer, you will be hands-on in the development of highly scalable enterprise products. The role includes but is not strictly limited to the following activities and disciplines.

  • Design and develop responsive web applications using Angular 5+
  • Solid knowledge of cross-browser HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Typescript
  • Optimise and work with front-end and back-end frameworks
  • Experience in UI testing and code quality tools (Mocha, Cucumber, BDD, Protractor, Selenium)
  • Experience in working within an agile scrum team and agile methods such as pair programming and test driven development
  • Working with database and data storage models
  • Investigate and recommend new and emerging tools and technologies to assist teams in achieving outcomes
  • Support implemented solutions by conducting root cause analysis on issues and corrective actions
  • Clearly document solution, complete unit tests and product architectures and maintain documentation for existing and future products
  • Knowledge around DevOps and Containers required for CI/CD
  • Cloud Platform Experience
  • Experience with CSS pre-processors (SASS, LESS)
  • Node.js Experience
  • Golang Experience a plus
  • Understanding of Mobile Development Experience

We are waiting:

Education, Work experience, and Competencies

  • Bachelor Degree Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering or the like
  • 5+ years’ experience in software development projects
  • Proven track record in developing and implementing digital projects
  • Project management experience with the ability to work independently with little supervision
  • Strong interpersonal skills to interact with diverse teams
  • Able to communicate – in writing, verbally, and visually; and ability to reduce complex subjects to succinct information
  • Ideally Agile Product Owner/Scrum Master certified or can otherwise demonstrate experience in working within Agile Scrum Teams
  • Fluent written and spoken English
  • Strong solution orientation and problem solving skills.
  • Automotive, Finance or Banking Industry domain knowledge a definite plus.

Technical Competencies

  • Experience in Technologies including Microsoft Web API, Angular 5+
  • Technical front end development, with strong development experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript based technologies (Angular 5+, jQuery)
  • Strong understanding of front-end optimization techniques and desire to keep up-to-date on the latest front-end techniques and trends
  • Develop with CSS libraries such as Bootstrap, Foundation, Semantic UI
  • Some understanding of .NET and SQL/Oracle database
  • Use deployment tools (such as Github, Bitbucket and Team Foundation Server etc.)
  • General understanding of Service Oriented Architecture
  • Understanding of APIs technologies and Apigee / ESB (IIB)
  • Knowledge of related trends such as DevOps, Performance Engineering, Containers (Docker) ect.
  • Familiar with the Atlassian Toolchain
  • Knowledge of Cloud Technologies, familiar with the 12 factors of cloud native application development
  • Strong knowledge of networking, Microsoft and Linux internals and IT-security

We offer:

  • Temporary contract for 1 year
  • Office located near m. Aeroport
  • Great work experience in multi-national project
